name: Rigatoni Florentine
author: Mary
summary: A pasta recipe with  roasted garlic in a tangy, pink sauce.
ingredients: 10 ounces fresh spinach, washed and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat
Add chicken and saute until cooked through and no longer pink inside
Add garlic to skillet; saute until golden
Add cream and spaghetti sauce to skillet; cook over medium heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until sauce thickens
Add cooked chicken and spinach and cook until spinach reduces
Then add rigatoni; toss with cheese and serve
